column15: What is your annual household income?
column16: What was your overall impression of this event (quality, lighting, sound, value)?
column17: Please share any other suggestions or ideas that would help us enhance your experience at Gesa Power House Theatre. If you would like someone to respond to your feedback, please include your contact information. Thank you!

column16: Excellent
It was perfect! What a great show. I’ve never heard a live flute. Each performer was so food! Thant you Gesa Powerhouse Theater for another great show!
Very good
Enjoyed it...energy was fun! Talent was evident!
I enjoyed it but it was different from described.  I thought it would be totally tango.  It would've been nice to have had a more complete description.
The talent of this group is amazing. I thoroughly  enjoyed the music and the dancing. I would definitely see them again.
Excellent.  Extremely talented musicians and dancers.
Excellent.  Except a.c. was too cool
column17: Fabulous program..bring more like this. Felt like we'd visited foreign countries without leaving our little burg. . wonderful 👍😊

column16: Loved it.
This was a great event.  Too bad that the venue was not sold out.
column17: Continue to bring high quality entertainment to the Gesa.

column16: Fabulous production that highlighted exceptional talent and creative ingenuity.  The production was excellent from start to finish.  Also, the chance to meet the members of the production after the show added to the enjoyment of the evening.  They are to be complimented for giving their time and interest in our community.  In conversation, it appeared that they did not know the history of the Power House Theatre and were notably impressed when mentioned.  This should be a given when prospective events and performers are being solicited to perform at the Theatre.  Indeed, our evening was special and well worth the price of admission.
column17: Would like to see the pre-show lobby amenities supported to a larger extent.  Would hope it could inspire 'meet and greet', good conversation and the opportunity to meet folks from the community.  Would like to suggest that the refreshments offered, particularly the wines, be priced more reasonably and/or a standard pour of 6 ounces be offered (not 5 oz.).  If the refreshments were more reasonably priced and also advertised with an event, this might help to encourage folks to come a little early and enjoy.

column16: Great event!
column17: You still have a crease in your screen about 20 percent down from the top.  It is distracting when video is shown with light colored scenes.  It comes across as a black line.

column16: I'd give it about a B+. The performers were all certainly competent, even talented, but somehow the production lacked electricity. I believe they would be well served by engaging a theatre director, someone who could give coherence and direction to lighting, costumes, projections and sound. For instance, why were there numerous costume changes for the players, while the female dancer wore a skirt thrown over a studio leotard? Why not a tango dress? What they have almost makes it, and they could go the extra step, but they need fresh eyes to look at it.
column17: Staff at PHT were great as always.

column16: Excellent
Good. Not excellent but good.
Excellent
column17: Can you bring in Savannah Fuentes ?

column16: Excellent
column17: This was a highly appreciated show ! Thank you for bring in Tango Del Cielo !

column16: Fabulous, very professions, excellent sound, impeccable timing, and a great social gathering prior to the event.  Definitely a memorable evening
column17: Just continue building the audience and the marketing campaign to ensure more and more people participate in this great arts venue.

column16: I thoroughly enjoyed the show.  The audio was perfect, lighting could have been a little better planned to set specific mood for certain musical selections.
column17: Keep getting the word out on all of your events!
